Shoot for the stars with the Tissot Supersport Chrono Basketball Edition ???Combining Swiss watchmaking with basketball-inspired design, this sleek and dynamic sports watch is the perfect partner for timing every second of every NBA Play-Off game. #TissotNBA #SupersportChrono

From   its gently domed case to its Nivachron Powermatic 80 movement, the new Chemin   des Tourelles is designed to thrill. #Tissot #watch #CheminDesTourelles #swisswatch #switzerland   #breakingnewpaths
A new, slimline design. Sophisticated, luxurious details. Are you ready to rediscover an icon of Swiss watchmaking? #Tissot #watch #CheminDesTourelles #swisswatch #switzerland   #breakingnewpaths

Success isn't about taking shortcuts, it's about dedicating yourself to your craft and pushing your limits. Tissot's ambassadors - @Dame_Lillard , @Bestia23 , @rogla and @jolandaneff - know this all too well. Let their stories inspire you to stay committed to your goals.
An icon of Swiss watchmaking heritage takes its place in the spotlight: Get ready for the new Chemin des Tourelles. #Tissot #watch #CheminDesTourelles #swisswatch #switzerland #breakingnewpaths

The new Chemin des Tourelles is both a promise of a lifetime of performance and a thrilling invitation to a world of refinement. #Tissot #watch #CheminDesTourelles #swisswatch #switzerland   #breakingnewpaths
#TimingEmotions

A soft-sunray dial with simple, elegant baton hour markers, each faceted to catch the light in an understated but sophisticated way, now that?s Swiss craftsmanship. ?? Discover the new Chemin des Tourelles. #Tissot #watch #swiss #swisswatch #switzerland #breakingnewpaths

Named after the street that leads to Tissot's home in the Swiss mountains, it?s a true pleasure to wear the new Chemin des Tourelles on your wrist. ? #Tissot #watch #swiss #swisswatch #switzerland #breakingnewpaths

If we were to ask you to close your eyes and think of the archetypal Swiss watch, you would see the Chemin des Tourelles. ?? Discover the updated and refined version of this Tissot icon. #Tissot #watch #swiss #swisswatch #switzerland #breakingnewpaths

It?s here! With its domed sapphire glass, mechanical movement and clean, circular dial, the new Chemin des Tourelles has all the hallmarks of a timeless classic. #Tissot #watch #swiss #swisswatch #switzerland #breakingnewpaths

Return home in style with the new update of the T-Touch Connect Solar. Choose from two Bring Me Back modes: Linear or Waypoints and let your watch guide your way back. ?? #Tissot #watch #swiss #swisswatch #parisnice #ttouchconnectsolar

The T-Touch Connect Solar is neither a gadget nor a device. It is a 47mm titanium watch, now with a new upgrade ?? Using emergency GPS to track your path, if you get lost, it will guide you back to your start point by retracing your steps. #Tissot #watch #ttouchconnectsolar
Tissot PRX, the watch for those with a passion for design and an eye for ingenuity. ?? #Tissot #PRX #prx35mm #1978 #blastfromthepast
Make your day epic at the Tissot Style Lounge in Salt Lake City, UT! #ALLSTARWEEKEND #OfficialTimekeeper Learn more: https://tissotwatches.com/en-us/tissot-style-lounge.html
Relive the glory days of sports timekeeping with our new Telemeter 1938. If you close your eyes, you can feel 85 years of sport events ticking on your wrist. ??

Did you know our first engagement as an official timekeeper was in 1938? Now, we?re an official partner of the world?s most renowned events, such as NBA games. To celebrate this beautiful connection between past and present, we brought back the Tissot Telemeter 1938.

Stay focussed on your goal with our Tissot T-Race MotoGP Automatic. This timepiece features a material we call SuperLuminova?, placed on visible parts where it functions as a miniature accumulator of reflected light. ??

The latest NBA Live Game feature of the T-Touch Connect Solar brings your favourite team?s match results direct to your wrist. Just another way to stay connected and stay on top of your game with Tissot. https://fcld.ly/ja32d6q #NBA #OfficialTimekeeper #TTCS
You know what time it is! The #NBA is back and Tissot is ready to take on another season as your #OfficialTimekeeper.  Tell us: Are you ready?
